The food coma may be strong right now, but it’s wise to check out the internet for the best Thanksgiving [Black Friday deals](https://www.engadget.com/black-friday/) you can get this year. With Black Friday no longer being a one-day affair, that means you can find excellent discounts online even on Thanksgiving when all brick-and-mortar locations are closed. It’s also wise to shop early for anything you think might sell out — that category typically includes a lot of tech, like AirPods, game consoles, new video games and more. Check out our curated list of the best Thanksgiving deals you can get right now below.

## Best Thanksgiving Black Friday deals

[**Apple AirPods Pro 3 for $220 ($29 off):**](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&itemId=amazon_B0FQFB8FMG&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=77c7f9bd-e94b-4928-a3a1-b7e787567e2b&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Amazon&linkText=Apple+AirPods+Pro+3+for+%24220+%28%2429+off%29%3A&custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL0FwcGxlLUNhbmNlbGxhdGlvbi1UcmFuc2xhdGlvbi1IZWFkcGhvbmVzLUhpZ2gtRmlkZWxpdHkvZHAvQjBGUUZCOEZNRy8_&signature=AQAAARSKAbcAMP5-j1UTc-0k9p0jJr69UlHUb38xMGlKLwIw&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FApple-Cancellation-Translation-Headphones-High-Fidelity%2Fdp%2FB0FQFB8FMG%2F) Apple's latest flagship wireless earbuds are the ones to get if you have an iPhone and any other Apple gear. They have improved sound quality, impressive ANC improvements, extra features like Live Translation and even better battery life. Most other AirPods are also on sale, including the [AirPods 4](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&itemId=amazon_B0DGHMNQ5Z&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=77c7f9bd-e94b-4928-a3a1-b7e787567e2b&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Amazon&linkText=AirPods+4&custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL2RwL0IwREdITU5RNVovcmVmPWZzX2FfbWR0Ml91czM_&signature=AQAAAd0naC466Hmf0gPNqx_rqBAKlSuMggJh2RqAsT3hCFMa&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fdp%2FB0DGHMNQ5Z%2Fref%3Dfs_a_mdt2_us3) and [AirPods Max](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&itemId=amazon_B0DGJC52FP&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=77c7f9bd-e94b-4928-a3a1-b7e787567e2b&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Amazon&linkText=AirPods+Max&custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL2RwL0IwREdKQzUyRlAvcmVmPWZzX2FfbWR0Ml91czI_&signature=AQAAAfNDjACdgRY3MBqhqHEdOCg2KNrM_dAcmlO8V8nc_LKa&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fdp%2FB0DGJC52FP%2Fref%3Dfs_a_mdt2_us2).

I bought this on a whim after wishing I could refresh some of my most-loved wardrobe staples without spending hours pulling pills off myself. Philips' fabric shaver has delivered and then some, and my clothes look much fresher than before.
